stimulusHtml: Close examination of the maze-like galleries of the temple complex at Chavín de Huántar has led scholars to theorize that they might have functioned as
choicesHtml: a defensive system intended to disorient enemy attackers
a symbolic representation of the soul's passage into the afterlife
an acoustic system for projecting sounds to the plaza outside the temple
a passageway for accessing subterranean burial sites and shrines of rulers
